body: Damn, just finished reading Russian teacher's doujin and felt happy. Now that's all gone after this...

Russian teacher was in Girls forM vol 10 but was president the girl from the old mostly text series that ended with the girl returning from work trip while her assistants had helped teasing the boy during it?
i think ive seen the russian teacher somewhere
(sorry, chapter 4, lets just make it easier, its Sakura, sakura, sakura, I love you!)
@XFantasy7 it gets worse when you go back and re-read chapter 5 and realize sakura is getting her love advice and tips from her
@Ravenleaf holy shit I just read the student council girl's story. You are right, she is MUCH crazier.

Took a while to get here, but its finally here. @Doomed actually there is also the one that is just the teacher and friend stories as well, so its like 8 actually. Also it should be noted the friend is way freakier then this girl, but somehow the love is still there
is there a prequel to this?
